translation.en: and a really large fish, the three tools of a hero!
translation.ko: 그리고 아주 커다란 생선 영웅의 세 가지 조건이지!

translation.en: Hang on. That doesn't make any…
Speed, spirit and a very large…? [exhales]
translation.ko: 민첩성, 굳센 정신 그리고 아주 커다란…?

translation.en: If I'm gonna tell this story…
-I've got to catch you up on everything. -[grunting]
[narrator] So, there was this town once, Baltese.
Oh, you should have seen it.
-[whimsical music playing] -Which I guess you are now, so, good.
The sort of place where everything felt possible
translation.ko: 발티즈는 모든 게 가능할 것만 같은 도시였어

translation.en: like that lady making the fountain go nuts.
translation.ko: 분수가 널을 뛰게 만드는 저 여자처럼 말이지

translation.en: [narrator] Or these kids, doing some sophisticated, magical…
[clears throat] Anyway, times changed, like times do.
translation.ko: 그러다 세상이 변했어 세월이란 게 원래 그렇지

translation.en: And let me tell you, it wasn't good.
There was the Great Foreign War, and after that,
translation.ko: 다른 나라와 전쟁이 일어났고 그 뒤로

translation.en: people in Baltese just stopped believing.
and then the clouds rolled in.
Strange clouds that never break or budge or snow.
translation.ko: 이상한 구름은 없어지지도 움직이지도, 눈을 뿌리지도 않았지

translation.en: The town's been stuck, but things are about to get unstuck.
translation.ko: 도시는 구름 속에 갇혔어 하지만 곧 뻥 뚫리게 될 거야

translation.en: I mean, otherwise, why would I tell this story? That'd be pretty boring.
translation.ko: 계속 갇혀 있을 거면 이 얘길 왜 하겠어? 그건 따분하잖아

translation.en: Peter is an orphan being raised by an old soldier.
translation.ko: 피터는 고아로 나이 많은 군인의 손에 키워졌지

translation.en: The soldier knows about fighting and hardship and danger,
translation.ko: 전투와 고난, 위험에 관해 잘 아는 군인은

translation.en: so he's training the boy for that kind of life.
But the boy knows there must be more.
translation.ko: 하지만 소년은 그게 다가 아니란 걸 알지

translation.en: but as orphan, you have a rare privilege.
translation.ko: 하지만 네가 고아라서 좋은 점도 있어

translation.en: You can devote yourself to soldier's life.
Get our fish and bread now
Older bread the better, bread to make your teeth… strong,
translation.ko: 오래된 빵일수록 좋아 네 이를 더 단단하게 만들어 줄 빵

translation.en: and small fish so you are accustomed to hunger.
translation.ko: 생선은 굶주림에 익숙해지도록 작은 걸 사 오고
안녕하세요, 테일러 씨 좋은 아침이다, 피터

translation.en: Are you going to the opera tonight, madam?
Certainly. The only thing I enjoy in this town.
translation.ko: 그럼요, 이 도시에서 즐길 거리라곤 그것뿐이니까요

translation.en: Ah, Peter, I saved you a beautiful piece today that you can't refuse.
translation.ko: 피터, 네가 거부 못 할 아주 근사한 놈을 준비해 놨다

translation.en: Hey, Peter. Here's the most disappointing fish for you.
translation.ko: 피터, 널 위한 가장 실망스럽게 작은 생선이다

translation.en: that could possibly be posed by the human heart or mind
will be answered for the price of one coin."
Your Guardian Vilna Lutz will be angry if you return without dinner.
translation.ko: 네 보호자 빌나 러츠가 저녁거리 없이 돌아가면 화낼 텐데

translation.en: [splutters] Where'd you come from? How do you know that?
one day without food or the rest of your life without knowing?
translation.ko: 하루 굶는 게 나을지 평생을 모른 채 사는 게 나을지
- 그걸 어떻게… - 동전 한 닢에 질문 하나야

translation.en: Well, my family died in the war when I was three years old. There was a battle--
translation.ko: 제가 3살 때 전쟁으로 가족이 죽었어요, 전투가 있었고…

translation.en: Vilna Lutz rescued you, and he's raising you to be a soldier.
translation.ko: 빌나 러츠가 널 구해서 군인으로 키우고 있지

translation.en: [splutters] When my father died, my mother--
She was expecting a child. I also know.
Sergeant Lutz told me that during the birth,
both she and the baby died, but--
[splutters] I held her. I know I did.
She was so small and she was--
You will only get one question, so be careful.
translation.ko: 질문은 하나만 할 수 있어 그러니 신중하게 고민해

translation.en: Stop! Stop and think for a moment.
Think of the right question, Peter.
-You're having fun with me. -You have your answer.
"Follow the elephant?" I gave you our one coin for today.
translation.ko: 코끼리를 따라가라고요? 저녁과 맞바꾼 동전을 줬잖아요

translation.en: You made a choice. You asked a question.
translation.ko: 선택은 네가 했어 질문도 네가 했고

translation.en: Follow the elephant and you'll find her.
translation.ko: 코끼리를 따라가면 동생을 찾게 될 거야

translation.en: But there aren't any elephants here!
We have no dinner tonight because of Fortune Teller?
Yes, sir, but she knew so much about me! About you! I--
translation.ko: 네, 저에 관해 많이 알더라고요 중사님에 관해서도…

translation.en: How could she know about me? I do not even know about me.
translation.ko: 나도 날 잘 모르는데 그 사람이 무슨 수로?

translation.en: She said that my sister lives
I know, sir. You've told me all these years that my sister--
I saved you, which was all that I could do!
translation.ko: 난 널 구했어 그것밖에 할 수 없었다

translation.en: A storybook? Who is Romain De Smedt--?
Gimme, gimme, gimme! Romain De Smedt drive me crazy.
translation.ko: 내놔! 로만 데 슈미트만 생각하면 골치가 아파

translation.en: Young soldier I served with, good boy.
translation.ko: 함께 군 생활을 한 젊은 병사였다 착한 친구였어

translation.en: But he read this book at night which remind him of home,
translation.ko: 그런데 밤마다 이 책을 읽으며 고향과 어머니, 안락함을 떠올렸어

translation.en: I had to cure him of all of this.
translation.ko: 난 그런 생각을 지워 줘야 했다

translation.en: Without this book, he turned into the most fearsome soldier in army.
translation.ko: 이 책이 사라지니 가장 무시무시한 병사가 됐지

translation.en: Why are you telling me this?
Where there is comfort, there is innocence.
you were told… a fairy tale.
One just as false as any in this book!
Spyglass. Spyglass, Peter. Spyglass! Spyglass! Peter!
Yeah. That is a smart strategy.
If only I could find a pattern.
♪ Fish are small, bread is stale ♪
♪ Life is not a fairy tale ♪
[Peter] ♪ Fish are small, bread is stale ♪
[both] ♪ Life is not a fairy tale ♪
[Peter] ♪ Fish are small, bread is stale ♪
-♪ Life is not a fairy tale ♪ -Furry little paws.
translation.ko: - 인생은 동화가 아니라네 - 작은 솜털 발에

translation.en: ♪ Fish are small, bread is stale ♪
♪ Life is not a fairy tale ♪
♪ Fish are small, bread is stale… ♪
-Oh, what did you put in this? -[chuckles] Turmeric.
Typically, we're spared marching during the dinner hour.
translation.ko: 보통 저녁 시간에는 행군을 멈추지 않니?

translation.en: I have to do extra because I spent our dinner money on a Fortune Teller.
translation.ko: 오늘은 제가 점술가에 돈을 써서 보충 행군을 하고 있어요

translation.en: Mm. And what did they tell you?
To follow an elephant… which doesn't exist.
My wife, she's tired of my "what ifs."
The elephant will lead me to my sister.
[sighs] A child shouldn't live like that, marching and marching.
translation.ko: 애는 저렇게 살아선 안 돼 끝도 없이 행군하잖아

translation.en: It's none of our business, Leo.
translation.ko: 우리가 신경 쓸 일 아니야, 레오

translation.en: [narrator] Now, at the exact same time across town,
The opening act is a magician.
-No, no, no, no, no, no! -[crowd laughs]
Can we just get it over with?
[Fortune Teller] The Magician isn't great at magic,
but even if he was, he realizes this crowd wouldn't care.
translation.ko: 마술에 뛰어났다고 해도 관객은 관심 없었을 거야

translation.en: He decides to try a powerful spell,
something to restore and revive all of Baltese.
translation.ko: 발티즈 전체를 회복시키고 되살릴 수 있는 주문을

translation.en: [Fortune Teller] One elegant, invisible moment of profound change.
translation.ko: 엄청난 변화를 가져올 보이진 않지만 품격 있는 순간이지

translation.en: [Fortune Teller] Like I said, he's not great at magic.
Hey! Hey, do you know what happened to the Fortune Teller's tent that was there?
translation.ko: 어제 저기 있던 점술가의 천막 어디 갔는지 아세요?

translation.en: Mm. Was a tent once. Maybe it was just laundry.

translation.ko: - 모자 가게였나? 난 모자가 좋아 - 또 이러네

translation.en: Does anyone know where the tent is? The Fortune Teller!
translation.ko: 천막 어디로 옮겼는지 아시는 분? 점술가 천막요

translation.en: An elephant? What? Wait, wait, wait!
Did you say elephant? Where is she?
They locked her up. And the Magician too.
-And what that means is my sister lives! -[grunts]
She lives! She lives, Mrs. Taylor!
translation.ko: 동생이 살아 있다! 테일러 씨, 동생이 살아 있어요

translation.en: -[laughs] Yes, an elephant! An elephant! -An elephant!
No, but I had strong and unreasonable hopes. [chuckles]
translation.ko: 아니, 하지만 근거 없는 강한 희망이 있었지

translation.en: She's locked up somewhere, but I have to get her, sir.
translation.ko: 어딘가에 갇혀 있다는데 구해 내야 해요

translation.en: I'll barter or sneak or fight my way in somehow.
But would you allow me to help?
I'll speak to the Countess and her advisers,
and you and I will… We'll figure it out together.
No, sir. An elephant has arrived here!
-An elephant! -An elephant will do you no good!
translation.ko: - 코끼리가요! - 코끼리는 아무 도움도 안 돼

translation.en: But it must be true, then! My sister lives!
translation.ko: 하지만 점술가 말이 맞았어요 동생은 살아 있다고요!
말도 안 돼! 동생은 태어나자마자 죽었다

translation.en: have you ever lied to me?
I'm saying she lives and I will find her.
translation.ko: 동생은 살아 있고 전 동생을 찾을 거예요

translation.en: -You, sir! Why did you do this to me? -Now, please--
-You brought me on stage! -[splutters] It was an accident.
Balderdash! You purposely crushed my leg with an elephant!
translation.ko: 허튼소리! 일부러 코끼리로 내 다리를 으스러뜨려 놓고

translation.en: No! It was… It was supposed to be…
-A bouquet of lilies. -Hey! What is all this?
translation.ko: 백합이었어요, 맞아요 백합 꽃다발요 이게 다 뭐죠?

translation.en: No idea! It's outrageous! Remove it at once.
translation.ko: 저도 모르겠네요, 황당해라 당장 없애 주세요

translation.en: How could I produce an elephant on purpose when I can't even escape from a jail cell?
translation.ko: 감옥에서 탈출도 못 하는 제가 무슨 수로 코끼리를 만듭니까?

translation.en: -Lima beans, my least favorite legume. -[woman grunts]
You're behind bars where you belong.
-I'm going to make sure you stay there. -[cell closes]
translation.ko: 평생 여기 갇혀 있게 해 주죠

translation.en: Direct, but polite. Strong, but respectful.
[Fortune Teller] The Countess, she's fair and wise,
and no one can remember the last time she laughed.
I've come to ask where the elephant is kept.
translation.ko: 코끼리가 어디에 있는지 알 수 있을까요?

translation.en: Have you been approached by a foreign power?
No. As captain of the palace guards, I need to know.
The elephant is dangerous. We don't even know where it came from.
translation.ko: 코끼리는 위험합니다 아직 어디서 왔는지도 몰라요

translation.en: The elephant is a criminal, it is being treated as such.
translation.ko: 범죄를 저질렀으니 그에 맞는 대우를 받고 있습니다

translation.en: -This may just be the opening barrage. -Uh, what?
translation.ko: - 전쟁을 선포한 걸 수도 있어요 - 네?

translation.en: We must expect other beasts to be launched at us!
We commanded the Magician to disappear her! He says he's unable!
translation.ko: 마술사에게 사라지게 해 달라고 했는데 못 한답니다

translation.en: -As such, we plan to destroy her! -[crowd gasps]
If a boy throws a rock through a window, can you blame the rock?
translation.ko: 아이가 창문에 돌을 던지면 돌을 탓하시겠습니까?

translation.en: -You're speaking of murder! -The elephant committed a crime!
translation.ko: - 살인을 저지르겠단 거잖아요 - 코끼리는 범죄를 저질렀어요

translation.en: The elephant is guilty of nothing except being an elephant!
I'll continue to consider this until we meet tomorrow.
translation.ko: 이 문제는 내일 다시 모일 때까지 결정하죠

translation.en: But let me say, Captain Matienne,
I take the safety of our town very seriously.
translation.ko: 나에겐 우리 도시의 안전이 무엇보다 중요해요

translation.en: She may need to be… gotten rid of.
[Fortune Teller] Now, Leo Matienne sees one other way to keep the elephant alive.
translation.ko: 레오 마티엔은 코끼리를 살릴 다른 방법을 떠올려

translation.en: -Mm. Huh? -…one, The King has never been to Baltese.
translation.ko: 첫째, 왕은 발티즈에 와 본 적이 없다는 것

translation.en: …over the palace wall, landing safely in the moat.
translation.ko: 궁전 벽을 넘어 안전하게 해자에 착륙하겠습니다

translation.en: [Fortune Teller] Two, The King likes to be entertained.
translation.ko: 둘째, 왕은 재밌는 걸 좋아한다는 것

translation.en: Hey, who wants a nougat? You like nougat?
And a doctor. And then they'll go again. Fantastic stuff. [laughs]
translation.ko: 의사도 불러줘요, 다시 하죠 아주 재밌어

translation.en: "An elephant came through a ceiling and hit an old lady."
His Majesty wants… [huffs] …to see the elephant!
-Peter, what are you doing? -[yelps] Mr. Matienne?
translation.ko: - 피터, 여기서 뭐 해? - 마티엔 씨?

translation.en: I was going to come get you.
I said I'd help you see the elephant.
Oh, uh, I guess I just…
I… I'm just not used to that.
[chuckles] Oh, this is the best, right?
[gasps] I know! I know! I wish I'd been there.
translation.ko: 그러게요, 들었습니다 저도 봤으면 좋았을 텐데

translation.en: Wow. Would you look at that.
I must admit, she is a magnificent creature.
I'd like you to stay at the palace and tend to my elephant.
-Oh. -The kid's got pluck. [laughs] I love it!
I need the elephant to lead me to my lost sister. It is my destiny.
translation.ko: 코끼리가 절 잃어버린 동생에게 안내할 거예요 그게 제 운명이죠

translation.en: I must ask you to give her to me.
The elephant is very dangerous, Peter. That's impossible.
translation.ko: 너무 위험한 동물이야, 피터 그건 불가능해

translation.en: I happen to like impossible things.
Hey, what if Peter does three impossible things
translation.ko: 만약에 피터가 불가능한 일 세 가지를 해내면

translation.en: Each day, I'll pick something impossible for the kid to do,
translation.ko: 내가 매일 꼬마에게 불가능한 주제를 던지고

translation.en: and if he does all three, thus proving his valor, strength, blah blah blah,
translation.ko: 꼬마가 자신의 용기와 강인함 등등을 세 번 증명하면

translation.en: If not, I'll take it back with me.
It's a deal! You're terrific, Countess. [laughs]
I like this place more and more, wherever we are.
translation.ko: 이곳이 점점 더 마음에 들어요 어딘진 잘 모르겠지만

translation.en: [clears throat] Okay, the first impossible task is…
And an impossible fight is the best kind, right?
-Stands to reason, sir. -The kid's up for it! I told you.
Right? He's got some idea about the elephant. -And destiny and… -Uh…
[laughs] I love it! Okay, tomorrow, noon, the kid fights my toughest soldier.
translation.ko: 맘에 들어요! 내일 정오에 가장 센 병사와 싸우게 될 겁니다

translation.en: Sabers it is! I love this kid! Give him my saber, Henri.
translation.ko: 검으로 가겠대요, 얘 맘에 드네 내 검을 줘요, 앙리

translation.en: Unless you get killed, in which case, you know, I'll take it back.
translation.ko: 네가 죽을 경우 검은 내가 도로 가져갈 거야

translation.en: Peter, has any of your training included sabers?
translation.ko: 피터, 훈련하면서 검을 써 본 적 있니?

translation.en: Meet me at the store, if you like. I'll try to teach you.
Oh, madness. How can the boy win?
translation.ko: 말도 안 돼, 애가 무슨 수로 이겨?

translation.en: Your "what ifs" will be the end of us, Leo Matienne.
translation.ko: 당신의 그 '만약에' 때문에 우린 끝장날 거야

translation.en: I beg your pardon, ma'am. But how can two small words be so dangerous?
translation.ko: 죄송하지만 어떻게 말 한마디가 그렇게 치명적일 수 있죠?

translation.en: In Leo Matienne's hands is how.
translation.ko: 레오 마티엔의 손에선 위험해질 수 있어

translation.en: What if we put all our savings into raising pygmy goats?
translation.ko: '만약에 저금한 돈을 다 빼서 피그미 염소를 기른다면?'

translation.en: If they could've been trained not to eat floors and walls.
translation.ko: 바닥재와 벽지를 먹지 않는 훈련만 됐었다면

translation.en: What if we import rare goods from the Far East?
If the entire shipment had not been eaten by pygmy goats.
translation.ko: 피그미 염소가 물건을 먹어 치우지만 않았다면

translation.en: You see this roll of silk?
My husband wanted to use it to kill himself.
translation.ko: 목숨 아까운 줄 모르고 뭘 만들더라

translation.en: It's called a parachute, and there is evidence it can work.
Actually, the results have been quite grisly. That's true.
But what if I had been the first?
I'm going to practice on the mannequins.
-Leo… -But with no one to love him.
And the two of us downstairs, all alone.
God does not intend for us to have children, Leo Matienne.
translation.ko: 신은 우리에게 아이를 주지 않기로 하셨어

translation.en: And who are we to say what God intends?
translation.ko: 신의 뜻을 우리가 감히 어떻게 알겠어?

translation.en: My heart has been broken too many times.
translation.ko: 내 심장은 이미 너무 많이 무너져 내려서

translation.en: It cannot bear your foolish questions.
translation.ko: 당신의 어리석은 질문에 답할 수 없어

translation.en: But how? How will the world ever change if we do not question it?
translation.ko: 우리가 물음을 던지지 않으면 세상은 변하지 않을 거야

translation.en: The world is what the world is and forever has been.
For here is Peter, standing before us,
asking us to make it something different.
-Are you well? -I dreamt of an elephant, Sister.
I find elephant dreams particularly moving and portentous,
translation.ko: 코끼리 꿈은 특히 더 감동적인 예지몽이라고 생각해

translation.en: although I'm forced to admit that I myself have never dreamt of an elephant.
translation.ko: 근데 내가 직접 코끼리 꿈을 꿔 본 적은 없단다

translation.en: It felt like the elephant came to take me somewhere.
translation.ko: 코끼리가 절 어딘가로 데려가려는 것 같았어요

translation.en: Oh, but you belong right here, dear child, where you're safe.
translation.ko: 하지만 네 집은 여기인걸 여긴 안전해

translation.en: I went out to see the world, Adele, and it was cruel.
translation.ko: 세상을 보러 나간 적이 있었는데 정말 잔혹했단다

translation.en: So I brought you home to the orphanage,
And I named you Adele after your mother,
translation.ko: 그리고 네 엄마 이름을 따서 아델이라고 지었단다

translation.en: who's in heaven now with your brother.
Mm. Do you think elephants have names?
Oh, yes. All creatures have names, dear.
[Fortune Teller] The elephant also has dreams.
and she hears her name spoken.
Somewhere she's known, somewhere she's loved.
translation.ko: 자신을 알아봐 주고 사랑해 주는 곳이야

translation.en: [Fortune Teller] She definitely doesn't belong here.
We met earlier, with the water.
translation.ko: 아까 너한테 물 준 사람 있잖아

translation.en: You may not know it yet, but…
you've been brought here to find my sister.
translation.ko: 네가 여기 온 이유는 내 동생을 찾기 위해서야

translation.en: Uh, I don't know where she is.
To win you, I have to fight The King's toughest soldier tomorrow.
translation.ko: 널 구하려면 내일 왕의 가장 센 병사와 싸워야 해

translation.en: all you have to do is just point on this map
translation.ko: 넌 지도에서 위치를 가리키기만 하면 돼

translation.en: and show me where my sister is.
Show me on this map here where she is.
Are you a magic talking elephant?
translation.ko: 혹시 말할 수 있는 마법 코끼리야?

translation.en: Can you tell me where she is?
Can you speak? Just speak. Say it.
translation.ko: 말할 수 있어? 아무 말이나 해봐

translation.en: Looks like I have to fight tomorrow.
There's a boy fighting for the elephant.
Peter, posta breve then moulinet! Remember, with the spin!
translation.ko: 피터, 포스타 브레베 다음에 물리네 스핀 주는 거 명심하고!

translation.en: [guard] De Smedt, have you got the boy?
[Vilna] Romain De Smedt, young soldier I served with.
translation.ko: 로만 데 슈미트 함께 군 생활을 한 젊은 병사였다

translation.en: I need the biggest fish you have, sir!
-What are you doing--? -Take this as payment. [straining]

translation.ko: 대구 - 근사한 만능 생선이지 - 목소리 좀…

translation.en: I must find a way to infiltrate their ranks.
translation.ko: 저 무리에 침투할 방법을 찾아야 해
저 여기 있어요, 데 슈미트 중사님
데 슈미트 중사님 저 여기 있어요!

translation.en: The book! The book! Look! The book! The book!
freed the dragon from his evil spell,
and everyone lived happily ever after.
Well, that's all for tonight, little carrot.
translation.ko: 오늘은 여기까지 읽자 우리 아가 당근

translation.en: All right, carrot. Just a teeny.
translation.ko: 알았어, 그럼 조금만 더 읽는 거다

translation.en: Do you believe a person can change?
[scoffs] I just beat you in battle, Sergeant.
I'm kind of amazed that worked.
You've done the first impossible task.
You've also lost my priceless family saber
and ruined a perfectly good killing machine.
translation.ko: 완벽한 살인 기계도 망쳐 놓긴 했지만

translation.en: "Hello," said Mr. Pig. "Hello," said Mr. Rooster.
translation.ko: '안녕', 돼지 씨가 인사했어 '안녕', 수탉 씨도 인사했지

translation.en: You're a surprisingly weird and dangerous young man.
-And I like that. -[grunts] Thank you, sir.
Now, tomorrow, for the second impossible task…
translation.ko: 내일 도전할 두 번째 불가능한 과제는…

translation.en: The kid just beat Goliath. You want him to bob for apples?
translation.ko: 방금 골리앗을 이긴 애한테 시시한 과제를 낼 순 없잖아요

translation.en: Plus, we've had some people nearly fly.
translation.ko: 나는 데 거의 성공한 사람들도 있었고

translation.en: Tomorrow at noon, we'll all meet in the square
translation.ko: 내일 정오에 광장에 모여서 이 아이가 나는 걸 지켜보죠

translation.en: and watch the kid fly or crash or both.
translation.ko: 내일 정오에 광장에 모여서 이 아이가 나는 걸 지켜보죠 추락하거나, 둘 다 할 수도 있고

translation.en: Like, like he really gets going but then, whammo!
No, of course not. No. Um… [clears throat]
I will get you water, and then I will learn how to fly
translation.ko: 물 갖다줄게 그런 다음 나는 법을 배워서

translation.en: and then I will get you out of here.
And we can find my sister.
[Fortune Teller] The elephant cannot understand human speech,
translation.ko: 코끼리는 인간의 언어를 알아들을 순 없지만

translation.en: but she can look at a face and recognize friendship.
translation.ko: 표정을 보고 우정을 느낄 순 있어

translation.en: but she does finally feel something like… hope.
And hope can spread from one person to the next.
translation.ko: 희망은 금세 여러 사람에게로 퍼져나갈 수 있어

translation.en: -He ran off like lightning! -I know! I saw it with my own eyes.
translation.ko: - 번개처럼 도망가더라고요 - 그러니까요, 내가 똑똑히 봤어요

translation.en: He bestowed upon me this sword in exchange for one cod.
translation.ko: 대구 한 마리에 이 검을 베풀었어요

translation.en: I can't wait to see what he has to do next.
translation.ko: 다음 과제는 뭐가 될지 너무 기대돼요

translation.en: I'm going early to get a good spot.
[woman] He held up a book! -[man 1] Like an avenging librarian!
-[boy] Incredible! Who knows what's next? -[man 2] It could be anything.
An elephant has appeared under miraculous circumstances.
No, no, no, no! We do not go to the city.
translation.ko: 안 돼, 도시에 가선 안 돼

translation.en: It is unsafe. Some harm could befall you.
translation.ko: 거긴 위험해 안 좋은 일이 생길지도 몰라

translation.en: But… my dream. This is a sign.
[chuckling] I do not believe in signs.
Yes. [scoffs] I do, in fact, believe in signs.
Perhaps you do not understand. My legs were crushed!
translation.ko: 이해를 못 하는 것 같은데 내 다리가 으스러졌어요

translation.en: [Fortune Teller] Yes, she comes here every day.
-[woman] My legs were crushed! -Go get help, boy.
translation.ko: - 내 다리가 으스러졌다고요 - 가서 도움 좀 청해 주라

translation.en: I know, your legs were crushed by an elephant.
I just intended a bouquet of lilies.
Just admit you crushed my legs with your tricks.
translation.ko: 당신이 마술로 내 다리를 으스러뜨린 거 인정해요

translation.en: It was an accident. I intended a bouquet of lilies.
[grunts] Peter. Peter, just stop. Stop this minute!
-Sir-- -Soldiers do not fly! I forbid it!
translation.ko: - 중사님 - 군인은 날지 않아 허락 못 해

translation.en: With De Smedt, you were lucky,
I beat De Smedt, and I believe I will fly!
translation.ko: 데 슈미트를 이겼으면 날 수도 있다고 믿어요

translation.en: And I believe you will be crushed flat. Dead.
translation.ko: 난 네가 추락할 거라고 믿는다 추락해서 죽을 거야

translation.en: but I have no idea how to do that.
Vilna says that I'm going to die. Like I don't know!
translation.ko: 중사님은 제가 죽을 거래요 저라고 그걸 모르겠어요?

translation.en: I have to fly tomorrow. I have to.
translation.ko: 하지만 내일 무조건 날아야 해요 반드시

translation.en: Come inside. You need to eat.
[woman] Okay, Peter, now, about this flying business.
translation.ko: 피터, 이제 하늘을 나는 얘길 좀 해보자

translation.en: As soon as you see the elephant,
we're going back to the orphanage where we're safe.
Now you see why we don't travel to the city, Adele.
translation.ko: 우리가 왜 도시에 안 오는지 알겠지?

translation.en: If only I'd kept the boy. The boy.
Please, listen. You have to get out of here.
Take the children. I'll meet you there.
I'm a soldier. I don't know how to care for a newborn.
translation.ko: 난 군인입니다 갓난아기는 돌볼 줄 몰라요

translation.en: Of course. Just the boy, then.
Please, I can't do it alone.
All right. But you have to leave at once.
I'll gather things for the baby and meet you at the garrison. Now, go!
translation.ko: 아기에게 필요한 것만 챙겨서 주둔지로 갈게요, 어서 가세요

translation.en: I should have taken them both.
It's not safe here, Sister! The enemy is coming!
If only I'd kept the boy with me.
-[Fortune Teller] A new day. -Hey, everybody! Hello!
Great day to watch the kid fly, eh? Not a cloud in the…
translation.ko: 꼬마가 나는 걸 보기 좋은 날이죠? 구름 한 점 없는…

translation.en: because, you know, with a tan… [chuckles]

translation.ko: 난 거부할 수 없는 매력의 소유자가 될 텐데

translation.en: I'm still King, right? I didn't miss a coup or something.
translation.ko: 나 아직 왕 맞죠? 쿠데타로 밀려난 거 아니죠?
단 한 번도 웃은 적이 없어요?

translation.en: Not since her brother died in the war.
They said the elephant would be here. Can you see her, Sister?
-No, stay with me! Stay with me! -[crowd cheers]
Okay. Let's see something impossible. Uh, where's the kid?
translation.ko: 자, 불가능한 걸 지켜보자고요 꼬마는 어디 있죠?

translation.en: I knew the kid could fly!
What is possible? It's possible! It's possible!
All right, I flew! What's next?
translation.ko: 보셨죠? 저 날았어요 다음 과제는 뭐죠?

translation.en: Well, you've done the second impossible task,
so, you are one step away from owning an elephant!
translation.ko: 한 번만 더 성공하면 코끼리를 가질 수 있어

translation.en: It doesn't sound great when I say it out loud. A lot of cleaning up.
translation.ko: 말하고 보니까 별로네 치울 게 엄청 많을 테니까

translation.en: [splutters] No, I'm a spur-of-the-moment kind of king, you know?
I… I come up with things on the fly, you know?
translation.ko: 그때그때 떠오르는 걸 말하죠 뭔 말인지 알죠?

translation.en: It's a joke. God, it's a quip, but…
Nope. Nope. Sorry. Stand down, son.
I just get like this when I'm about to say something incredible.
translation.ko: 원래 엄청난 걸 발표하기 전에 꼭 이러거든요

translation.en: you will make the Countess laugh.
What part of impossible is tripping you people up?
Im, not. Poss, the middle part… Im… Something…
translation.ko: '불' 안 된다, '가' 중간 부분… 불… 무언가…

translation.en: Okay, I have no idea, but it means
Anyone thinks they're better than this kid,
you're next jumping off the cathedral wearing a tent.
translation.ko: 서커스 천막 두르고 성당에서 뛰어내려 보든가요

translation.en: You should stop worrying about the kid and figure out who'll get me an ice cream.
translation.ko: 꼬마 걱정은 말고 누가 나한테 아이스크림 살지나 고민해요

translation.en: Anyone? Hello? Why are we all standing here?
translation.ko: 누구 없어요? 저기요? 왜 멀뚱히들 서 있죠?

translation.en: It's me, from the dream. Do you remember?
I'm here. Can you tell me why?
translation.ko: 나 왔어, 날 왜 부른 거야?

translation.en: [Peter] This one may really be impossible.
Maybe they'd let me jump off the cathedral again.
translation.ko: 다시 성당을 뛰어내리는 게 나을지도 몰라

translation.en: I could write you a joke.
You're probably just not very funny.
translation.ko: 넌 별로 안 웃길 것 같아서

translation.en: Right, and I'm sure you're hilarious.
It's unlike me to say something so insulting.
And I've never hit a person in my life.
Well, now that you've seen the elephant…
We'll get a good night's sleep, then go back to where we belong.
translation.ko: 오늘은 여기서 푹 자고 내일 집으로 돌아가는 거야
가끔 기억이 희미할 때가 있다, 피터

translation.en: what I have to say right now.
I left her with the nurse.
We were supposed to meet at the garrison, but there was an explosion.
[splutters] I… I didn't think I could tend to you both.
translation.ko: 그때 난 너희 둘을 다 돌볼 수 없을 것 같았다

translation.en: [voice breaking] What do I know about an infant?
I could have saved you both.
translation.ko: 난 너희를 둘 다 살릴 수 있었다

translation.en: because I didn't want to cause you any more pain.
translation.ko: 네가 그 이상의 아픔을 느끼지 않았으면 했거든
넌 불가능해 보이던 코끼리가 나타날 거라고 했고

translation.en: You stood before an impossible opponent…
Well, then, tell me a joke.
A horse walked into a bar. Um, maybe it can't walk into it.
translation.ko: 말이 술집에 걸어 들어갔어 걸어서 들어갈 순 없을 거야

translation.en: No, I didn't mean to hurt you or make an elephant appear,
translation.ko: 아뇨, 부인을 해치려던 건 아니었어요 코끼리를 부르려던 것도요

translation.en: but I wasn't trying for a bouquet of lilies either.
When I stood on that stage facing all of you,
Even now, you see magic right before you,
Granted, a fractured magic, sloppy, accidental, but…
To which you respond, "Stop," as you would to some minor nuisance.
That night, I tried to cast a spell on you and everyone else there.
translation.ko: 그날 밤, 전 부인과 관객에게 주문을 걸려고 했어요

translation.en: A spell to make you believe again,

translation.ko: 그러면 놀라운 일이 벌어질 수 있으니까요

translation.en: But I had no business attempting such a powerful spell,
translation.ko: 하지만 그렇게 강력한 주문을 쓸 자격은 없었습니다

translation.en: because I'm not a very good magician.
I tried for mystery and wonderment.
I know you're worried about the Countess laughing,
translation.ko: 백작이 안 웃을까 봐 걱정하는 거지?

translation.en: but I've got a great joke.
And I've got it under control. You gotta trust me.
translation.ko: 내가 다 알아서 할 거야, 날 믿어

translation.en: I feel like you're not taking me seriously. I'm a dangerous man.
translation.ko: 내 말을 못 믿나 본데 나 무서운 사람이야

translation.en: -I beat a giant, I jumped off a building. -[blows]
Okay, okay. There'll be plenty of time for messing about later.
translation.ko: 알았어, 앞으로 장난칠 시간은 많을 테니까

translation.en: We just have to concentrate on the final task, but…
Oh, I can't wait to get you out of here.
We're gonna have so much fun and so many adventures…
translation.ko: 앞으로 진짜 재밌을 거야 같이 모험도 많이 하고

translation.en: Hey, wake up. It's time now.
Everyone's here, Peter. The third task.
translation.ko: 세 번째 도전을 보려고 모두 모였어

translation.en: You must really miss them. I thought you were taking me back to my family.
translation.ko: 가족이 많이 그립겠다 난 네가 날 가족에게 데려다줄 줄 알았는데

translation.en: I need to get you back to yours.
It's time for the third impossible task!
translation.ko: 세 번째 불가능한 과제에 도전할 시간이 왔습니다!

translation.en: Will the kid finally win the elephant? [laughs]
translation.ko: 꼬마는 과연 코끼리를 차지할 수 있을까요?

translation.en: [King] Now, if at any point I hear the Countess laugh,
you walk away with the elephant.
So, there's a farmer and a fisherman.
-They're out in a field together. -Solid start. Classic.
translation.ko: - 하루는 들판에 나갔죠 - 시작이 좋군, 고전적이야

translation.en: When they hear a funny kind of croaking noise,
they look over towards the pond and they see a hen.
translation.ko: 연못 쪽을 봤더니 웬 닭이 있었죠

translation.en: The hen's got this piece of string,
translation.ko: 닭은 줄 한 가닥을 물고 있었는데

translation.en: and she's working the string in and out of the mouth of a frog by the pond,
translation.ko: 연못에 있는 개구리의 입에서 줄을 넣었다 뺐다 했어요

translation.en: up and down with the string in the frog's mouth.
So, the fisherman says, "Why do you think the hen's doing that?"
translation.ko: 그래서 어부가 물었죠 '닭이 왜 저러고 있지?'

translation.en: The farmer turns to the fisherman and says,
"Well, sure, it's the same question as always, isn't it?"
translation.ko: '뭐, 그거야 답은 너무 뻔한 거 아니야?'

translation.en: "Why did the chicken floss the toad?"
[laughs] Nailed it! Funny stuff, Peter! Funny stuff!
Why did the chicken--? Because it sounds like…
If you're not gonna take this seriously, Countess, then what's the point?
translation.ko: 백작, 진지하게 임할 게 아니면 이 도전은 의미가 없어요

translation.en: You have to let me take her,
but not for me, for her.
All this time, I've tried to win the elephant to find my family,
translation.ko: 지금까지 전 가족을 찾으려고 코끼리를 데려가려 했지만

translation.en: but she has a family and she was taken from them.
translation.ko: 코끼리에게도 가족이 있고 지금 가족과 떨어져 있잖아요

translation.en: The elephant might have a sister too.

translation.ko: 제 동생이 더 중요하란 법은 없죠

translation.en: I know the joke didn't work,
but please, the elephant didn't ask to be brought here.
translation.ko: 부탁드려요, 코끼리는 원해서 여기 온 게 아니잖아요

translation.en: We have to send her home.
No, no, no, no, no, no.
You had one last thing to do, and I don't see her laughing.
translation.ko: 넌 마지막 도전에 실패했어 백작이 안 웃었잖니

translation.en: Grab the elephant and we'll roll.
Okay, I know. This is impossible.
Think of all of the impossible things you've done,
Have you ever gotten through one of them alone?
Of course not. That would be absurd.
translation.ko: 그럴 리 없지, 그건 말이 안 돼

translation.en: Peter fought and flew and defied a king,
All right, kid, you did it.
But… but it was the elephant.
She's laughing, right? That's all I really wanted.
translation.ko: 백작이 웃고 있잖아 내가 원한 건 그거였어

translation.en: Things are only impossible till they're not.
translation.ko: 불가능은 가능으로 바뀌는 순간 불가능이 아니지

translation.en: We did it! We did it! [cheers]
How will we get her home?
Carried over the mountains by larger elephants!
translation.ko: 더 큰 코끼리로 산까지 운반하는 거예요

translation.en: That seemed good until I said it out loud.
This boy says the elephant must go home.
translation.ko: 이 꼬마가 코끼리를 집에 보내야 한대요

translation.en: You've seen what happens when I attempt that spell.
translation.ko: 제가 주문 외울 때마다 어떻게 되는지 보셨잖아요
더 끔찍한 게 나올 수 있었다고요

translation.en: Sir, the elephant deserves to be with her family.
Yeah, that's a lovely idea, but look around you.
translation.ko: 그래, 멋진 생각이긴 한데 주변을 봐

translation.en: -You brought an elephant through the roof. -[grunts]
And don't you realize it started something here?
translation.ko: 그걸로 이 도시가 어떻게 변했는지 모르겠어요?

translation.en: The very thing you wished for.
Hey, magic man! Let's send the big lady home!
translation.ko: 마술사 양반 덩치 큰 녀석을 집에 보내 줍시다!

translation.en: I believe that you can perform the necessary magic.
translation.ko: 마술사님은 할 수 있을 거라고 믿어요

translation.en: I believe that only you can set things right.
In my dream, I was meant to follow her.
[laughing] I do not believe in dreams.
Yes, I do, in fact, believe in dreams.
I heard it was different here before.
There was light, there was life, there was hope.
translation.ko: 빛도 있고, 활기차고 희망이 있는 곳이었죠

translation.en: The perfect kind of town to make an elephant disappear.
translation.ko: 코끼리가 사라지게 하는 마술도 손쉽게 하는 곳이었다고요

translation.en: It's hard to lose a friend.
We have to say goodbye now.
and I believe that he can send her home!
translation.ko: 다시 돌려보내실 수 있다고 전 믿어요

translation.en: That is how it will be accomplished.
[Fortune Teller] Belief is a great and invisible thing.
It comes over us like sleep.
fighting it for reasons we cannot name…
We stop… and we are restored.
I can't believe I just saw magic!
-[woman 1] What's happening? -[woman 2] Look at the clouds!
translation.ko: 어떻게 된 거지? 구름 좀 봐!

translation.en: -What is it? -[laughs] It's sun, my darling.
You were meant to follow her to your destiny.
Come on now, Adele. Time to go home.
translation.ko: 이만 가자, 아델 집에 갈 시간이야

translation.en: This is… this is my sister.
-First of all-- Let me just say-- -You're alive! And here!
translation.ko: - 있잖아, 난… - 살아 있었구나! 그것도 여기에!

translation.en: I'm sorry for the harm I've caused you, madam.
Just look at the place now.
A town restored. Can you see?
[Countess] You've been visiting for a while.
I know, but every time I try to leave,

translation.ko: 그러게요, 떠나려고 할 때마다 뭐랄까 불가능하더군요

translation.en: Just then, the magic coral woke up
and chased the oysters away shouting--
-Ooh, that was really scary. -[LaVaughn] Thank you.
[sighs] How do you find exotic yarn?
Oh, I've got my secrets, you know? I'm a big city lady.
translation.ko: 다 비결이 있죠 저 도시 사람이거든요

translation.en: Tell me you didn't make the goat more pajamas. All he does is eat them.
translation.ko: 염소한테 또 잠옷 만들어준 거 아니지? 다 먹어 치울라

translation.en: Yes, but he likes eating pajamas.
[Fortune Teller] And as for the elephant,
she lives a really long time,
long enough to test even an elephant's memory.
But of course, she never forgets Peter.
